details:
verb
- return to consciousness
= synonyms: come to
- give new life or energy to
= example: give new life or energy to
= synonyms: repair
- cause to regain consciousness
= example: cause to regain consciousness
= synonyms: resuscitate
- restore from a depressed, inactive, or unused state
= example: restore from a depressed, inactive, or unused state
= synonyms: resurrect
- be brought back to life, consciousness, or strength
= example: be brought back to life, consciousness, or strength
